title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The key in the properties file is left blank, but it has a valid value.
EB: Expected: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title. Actual: The externalized text cannot be displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set externalized text in the chart title.
